General.Name: Maven Income and Growth VCT 4 PLC
General.Description: Maven Income and Growth VCT 4 PLC is a venture capital trust fund specializes in mature and later stage. It seeks to invest in mature small and medium sized companies operating in a range of sectors and AIM/ISDX quoted companies. The fund invests in the United Kingdom. It does not invest more than £1 million ($1.2 million) in its companies within one year. It seeks a majority stake in the companies. The fund seeks to make co-investments.
General.Address: Kintyre House, Glasgow, United Kingdom, G2 2LW
